mapper.update: create table h_dbc_service ( service_id varchar2(100) , service_name varchar2(500) unique not null, service_desc varchar2(500), created_at number(20), updated_at number(20), constraint pk_dbc_service primary key (service_id) )
create table h_dbc_acc_service ( app varchar2(255), username varchar2(255), service_id varchar2(100), constraint pk_dbc_acc_service primary key (app, username, service_id) )
create table h_dbc_profiles ( profile_name varchar2(100), profile_desc varchar2(500), created_at number(20), updated_at number(20), constraint pk_dbc_profiles primary key (profile_name) )
create table h_dbc_acc_profiles ( app varchar2 (255), username varchar2 (255), profile_name varchar2 (100), constraint pk_dbc_acc_profiles primary key (app, username, profile_name) )

create table h_dbc_config ( app varchar2(50), username varchar2(50), service_id varchar2(50), profile_name varchar2(50), config_key varchar2(500), config_value clob, created_at number(20), updated_at number(20), constraint pk_dbc_config primary key (app, username, service_id, profile_name, config_key) )

create table h_dbc_config_file ( app varchar2 (50), username varchar2 (50), service_id varchar2 (50), profile_name varchar2 (50), file_name varchar2 (100), file_content clob, created_at number (20), updated_at number (20), constraint pk_dbc_config_file primary key (app, username, service_id, profile_name) )
